Posts.Content: Nov 1, 2014 10:17AM mandyk3 wrote: It's great to hear other people's stories who have been thru this and are doing well:) it is very inspirational.... I was diagnosed with stage 3a, grade 3 breast cancer earlier this year.  Did the chemo and just finished radiation. Now just taking it one day at a time.
